recipe_name: Spiced sausages with Italian-style roast potatoes
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. For the potatoes, heat the olive oil in an ovenproof frying pan and fry the potatoes for 8-10 minutes, or until they start to colour. Add the rosemary, garlic cloves and salt. Place the pan in the oven and roast until the potatoes are cooked through, about 8-10 minutes. For the sausages, heat the olive oil in a frying pan and add the sausages. Add the chilli flakes and cook over a medium heat, turning often, for about 10-15 minutes, or until completely cooked through. To serve, place the sausages on one side of a serving plate and the rosemary potatoes on the other. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper and garnish with a sprig of fresh rosemary.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 baking potato, peeled and chopped into chunks,  2 sprigs fresh rosemary, chopped roughly,  4 garlic cloves, crushed roughly with the flat side of a large knife,  1 tsp sea salt,  1 tbsp olive oil,  2 pork sausages,  1 tsp dried chilli flakes,  pinch cayenne pepper ,  1 small sprig fresh rosemary
